settings.title: Be Zulu! Podcast
settings.description: The Zulu Mixes: House, Techno and Drum'n'Bass sets mixed by dj's Djive, Kameren J and Lester. Discover the particular style of the Zulu Dj's: mixing old school classics with today's hits, vocal house on a a techno beat, original funk tunes inside a techno set, that's the Zulu Sound ! A varied and eclectic vision of electronic music, "Be Zulu!"
settings.author: DJ Djive, Kameren J (aka Lionites) and friends
settings.itunesAuthor: DJ Djive, Kameren J (aka Lionites) and friends
